would not be greatly affected. After discussion the Executive Com¬
mittee VOTED that:
1. New categories for Council membership be established
for institutions with 10,000 or more enrollmentj

a minimum of 50$ effective January 1, 1962. The

3. Multi-campus institutions will pay membership dues
for each campus as individual institutions, with
the following proviso: The President of the Council
is authorized to establish a service charge, equita¬
ble in regard to the costs borne by the total member¬
ship of the Council, to be worked out administratively
where an institution elects single membership but de¬
sires services on a multi-campus basis. This arrange¬
ment to be in effect for the forthcoming year, with
the understanding that discussions will continue and
a report made to the Executive Committee.
4. The basis for determining enrollment will be the
opening fall enrollment of the institutions for
the fall immediately preceding the year of assess¬
ment .
